strings.Value: "Magic is such a strange thing… If you don't keep an eye on your spells, the next day you may find yourself without any!"
"Magic is like armor and weapons: if you don't look after it, it will eventually fail you!"
"Trust me, it becomes a habit in no time! Preparing your spells will be routine before you know it!"
"Magic is a bizarre and mysterious thing. It comes to its adepts in such strange and unusual ways…"
"Magic, bodily strength, even faith demand constant dedication. The moment you turn your back on them, they falter. It's true of all that exists in this world."
"You know, before sleep I like to recall verses from my favorite songs. It's like a little ritual, and very soothing!"
"I never expected you to take up studying the magical arts... But you're making progress!"
"I never expected you to take up studying the magical arts... But you're making progress!"
